DOC.brief_summary: Martorell hypertensive ischemic leg ulcer severe type skin necrosis ( skin infarction ) occur long-term hypertensive subject . Calciphylaxis ( calcific uremic arteriolopathy ) severe type skin necrosis ( skin infarction ) occur subject end-stage kidney disease kidney transplantation .
DOC.brief_title: Pathophysiology Martorell Hypertensive Ischemic Leg Ulcer ( HYTILU )
DOC.detailed_description: Comparative study include - 20 consecutive patient Martorell HYTILU - 10 consecutive patient Calciphylaxis ( calcific uremic arteriolopathy ) - 20 patient venous ulcer The following parameter measure blood serum : White blood count ; c-reactive protein ; creatinine ; calcium ( total ) ; free ( ionize ) calcium ; phosphate ; albumin ; 25-hydroxyvitamin-D ; 1-25-dihydroxyvitamin-D ; homocysteine ; cystatin C alphafetoin , osteoprotegerin ; fibroblast growth factor 23 ( FGF-23 ) ; globular arrest 1 ( GLA-1 ) The following parameter measure sample diseased ( necrobiotic ) skin : alphafetoin , osteoprotegerin ; fibroblast growth factor 23 ( FGF-23 ) ; globular arrest 1 ( GLA-1 )
DOC.criteria: Having Martorell hypertensive ischemic leg ulcer ( define ) Having Calciphylaxis ( calcific uremic arteriolopathy ( define ) Having venous ulcer ( define )
